name: Witch of Mystery Tower
description:
“30cm games”is a newly established Taiwan-based game development team. All of us love to make games which can satisfy player’s requirement and inspire players' desire. Hope you can support local developing teams. Your support is our great motivation.

Description of adult content:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
It contains content that is not for all ages, such as partial nudity, sexual themes, and intense language.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
